    public class NoteEditActivity
extends androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity
    This class is in charge of creating, viewing or editing a note

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected java.lang.String getPathFromUri(android.net.Uri contentUri)
      Gets the image's path from phone using passed Uri
      protected void initMiscellaneous()
      Initializes the miscellaneous layout (a BottomSheets layout) and does a few other operations: 1.
      protected void onCreate(android.os.Bundle savedInstanceState) 
      void onRequestPermissionsResult(int requestCode, java.lang.String[] permissions, int[] grantResults)
      Requests the permissions in order to create a note
      protected void saveNote(int code)
      Saves the note to the database (adds, updates or deletes depending on the code given) and goes back to the "NotesFragment" with the code (to show what kind of save was done)
      protected void selectImage()
      Allows the user to select a photo from his gallery
      protected void setSubtitleIndicatorColor()
      Sets the color of the note to the color picked in the BottomSheets
      protected void setViewOrUpdateNote()
      Sets the layout of an existing note that is opened by the user
      protected void showAddURLDialog()
      Shows the "dialogAddURL" and adds the url the user picked if the add button was clicked (after checking its a valid url), if not it cancels the dialog
      protected void showDeleteNoteDialog()
      Shows the "dialogDeleteNote" and calls the "saveNote" function with the delete request code if the delete button was pressed, if not, it cancels the dialog

      • onCreate

        protected void onCreate(android.os.Bundle savedInstanceState)
        Overrides:
        onCreate in class androidx.fragment.app.FragmentActivity

      • setViewOrUpdateNote

        protected void setViewOrUpdateNote()
        Sets the layout of an existing note that is opened by the user

      • saveNote

        protected void saveNote(int code)
        Saves the note to the database (adds, updates or deletes depending on the code given) and goes back to the "NotesFragment" with the code (to show what kind of save was done)
        Parameters:
        code - The request code in order to know what type of save it is (add, update, delete)

      • initMiscellaneous

        protected void initMiscellaneous()
        Initializes the miscellaneous layout (a BottomSheets layout) and does a few other operations: 1. Checks if BottomSheets was clicked, if so then it pops it up if its in "COLLAPSED" mode, and pushes it down if its in "EXPANDED" mode 2. Gets the color that was picked 3. Sets image "ic_done" to the selected color 4. If "availableNote" is initialized (existing note), then it performs a click on the right image depending on the color saved in the existing note 5. Checks if "layoutAddImageNote" is clicked. If it is, it checks if the permission to read external storage is permitted. If it is, the "select image" function is called, if not the permission is requested 6. Checks if "layoutAddUrlNote" is clicked. If it is, the "showAddURLDialog" function is called 7. If "availableNote" is initialized (existing note) it checks if "layoutDeleteNote" is clicked. If it is, the "showDeleteNoteDialog" function is called

      • showDeleteNoteDialog

        protected void showDeleteNoteDialog()
        Shows the "dialogDeleteNote" and calls the "saveNote" function with the delete request code if the delete button was pressed, if not, it cancels the dialog

      • setSubtitleIndicatorColor

        protected void setSubtitleIndicatorColor()
        Sets the color of the note to the color picked in the BottomSheets

      • selectImage

        protected void selectImage()
        Allows the user to select a photo from his gallery

      • onRequestPermissionsResult

        public void onRequestPermissionsResult(int requestCode,
                                       @NonNull
                                       java.lang.String[] permissions,
                                       @NonNull
                                       int[] grantResults)
        Requests the permissions in order to create a note
        Specified by:
        onRequestPermissionsResult in interface androidx.core.app.ActivityCompat.OnRequestPermissionsResultCallback
        Overrides:
        onRequestPermissionsResult in class androidx.fragment.app.FragmentActivity
        Parameters:
        requestCode - Specifies each permission
        permissions - The requested permissions
        grantResults - The results of the permissions, if they were enabled or not

      • getPathFromUri

        protected java.lang.String getPathFromUri(android.net.Uri contentUri)
        Gets the image's path from phone using passed Uri
        Parameters:
        contentUri - The uri of the image selected by the user
        Returns:
        {String} The string of the image's path in order to store in the DB

      • showAddURLDialog

        protected void showAddURLDialog()
        Shows the "dialogAddURL" and adds the url the user picked if the add button was clicked (after checking its a valid url), if not it cancels the dialog
